thread.title: Dark Clouds Loom for Airlines Even as Their Profits Take Off
thread.title_full: Dark Clouds Loom for Airlines Even as Their Profits Take Off - WSJ

author: Susan Carey
title: Dark Clouds Loom for Airlines Even as Their Profits Take Off
text:
U.S. airlines are producing their biggest profits ever. But instead of clear skies, they are encountering problems that their recent prosperity, in some cases, is making worse.
Employees at Southwest Airlines Co. and Delta Air Lines Inc. have rejected labor contracts in recent weeks, with some arguing that the compensation wasn’t sufficient given the industry’s financial performance.
